name: Bertie's Fried Chicked
description: A fast food type diner for those wanting some of Bertie's delicious classic chicken.

name: After Dark Diner
description: Our only diner open until late so you can enjoy some filling food after a day full of fun.

name: Icecream Fusions
description: The perfect stop off on a hot day or even a fun educational activity. Choose from our many flavours or sign up to our daily icecream making science class - Limited availability
avgPrice: Avg £5 per head (£8 for icecream making class)

name: Pit Stop
description: Get some icecold drinks, icecreams and more to help cool you down.

name: Hot Food Van
description: Grab some quick hot food from our rotating hot food van, different van every week ranging from classic british foods to different fusions from around the world.
avgPrice: Avg £3 - £15 per head, varies due to rotations

name: Night at the Opera
description: Our world famous horror themed restaurant with similarly themed meals for the horror lover in you.
avgPrice: Avg £35 per head based on a three course meal for one adult
